com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice.rpc
Class RPCMessageClient

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice.rpc.RPCMessageClient

public class RPCMessageClient
extends java.lang.Object

This object is responsible for establishing a connection to the Message Service and for setting the appropriate RPC proxy and handler so that messages can be constructed appropriatly.

create

public static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.String from,
                                      java.lang.Class targetInterface,
                                      java.lang.Class asyncInterface,
                                      java.lang.String targetURL)
                               throws RPCMessageClientException
This method is called to setup a async interface so that messages can be sent properly.

Parameters:
from - The address all the requests will come from.
targetInterface - The target interface.
asyncInterface - The asynchronis interface.
targetURL - The target url for the message.
Returns:
The reference that was created.
Throws:
RPCMessageClientException

create

public static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.String from,
                                      java.lang.Class targetInterface,
                                      java.lang.Class asyncInterface,
                                      java.util.List services,
                                      boolean broadcast)
                               throws RPCMessageClientException
This method is called to setup a async interface so that messages can be sent properly.

Parameters:
from - The address all the requests will come from.
targetInterface - The target interface.
asyncInterface - The asynchronis interface.
services - The list of services for this rpc message
broadcast - If true this message will be sent to all daemons suppling the given service.
Returns:
The reference that was created.
Throws:
RPCMessageClientException

createOneWay

public static java.lang.Object createOneWay(java.lang.String from,
                                            java.lang.Class targetInterface,
                                            java.lang.Class asyncInterface,
                                            java.lang.String targetURL)
                                     throws RPCMessageClientException
This method is called to setup a async interface so that messages can be sent properly. The message will only go one way no result will be received.

Parameters:
from - The address all the requests will come from.
targetInterface - The target interface.
asyncInterface - The asynchronis interface.
targetURL - The target url for the message.
Returns:
The reference that was created.
Throws:
RPCMessageClientException
